name: Closet of Mystery
description:
A dirty broom closet! An impenetrable mystery! Can your mind endure it?

A short & strange text adventure, created in an afternoon for PunyJam #1. See the jam page for the rules.

I didn't have a lot of time before the deadline, but wanted to show support for PunyInform, so here it is! Hopefully it provides a few minutes of entertainment.

Zip file includes .d64 file for Commodore 64, plus a .z3 file that will run on any platform with a Z-Machine interpreter.
